  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3407</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The brain , how does it compute.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gehirn, wie es rechnet.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cerveau, comment il calcule.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cérebro, como computa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cervello, come computa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο εγκέφαλος, πώς υπολογίζει.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cerebro, cómo computa.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an article which discusses the history of brain research and how we think it controls the multiple and varying functions of our body</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">research</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">control</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Artikel, der die Geschichte der 
Gehirnforschung behandelt und wie wir denken es die 
Mehrfachverbindungsstelle und die unterschiedlichen Funktionen unseres
Körpers steuern</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un article qui discute l'histoire de la recherche de
cerveau et comment nous pensons il contrôle le multiple et les 
fonctions variables de notre corps</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um artigo que discuta o history da pesquisa do 
cérebro e como nós pensamos ele controlamos o múltiplo e as 
funções variando de nosso corpo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un articolo che discute la storia di ricerca del 
cervello e come pensiamo esso gestiamo il multiplo e le funzioni di 
variazione del nostro corpo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα άρθρο που συζητά την ιστορία της 
έρευνας εγκεφάλου και πώς σκεφτόμαστε ελέγχει τις πολλαπλάσιες 
και ποικίλες λειτουργίες του σώματός μας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un artículo que discute la historia de la 
investigación del cerebro y cómo pensamos él controlamos el 
múltiplo y las funciones que varían de nuestro cuerpo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehirn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steuerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cerveau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">recherche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commande</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cérebro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesquisa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">controle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cervello</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ricerca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">controllo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
